sentences.english: PUA has good wear resistance and flexibility advantages.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯丙烯酸酯具有耐磨性好，柔韌性好的優點。

sentences.english: A material's loss of malleability due to chemical treatment or physical change.
sentences.chinese: 材料由於化學處理或物理變化喪失了柔韌性。

sentences.english: Organic compound between fluorocarbon and resin, soft and smooth body lines, easy casting.
sentences.chinese: 氟碳樹脂有機複合，線體柔韌結構不同，易於拋投。

sentences.english: This is more flexible than the board last but less supportive.
sentences.chinese: 這種鞋幫柔韌性比第一種好，但是支撐性要差一些。

sentences.english: Kabaeva is known for her extreme natural flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 卡巴耶娃因爲身體天生的柔韌性著稱。

sentences.english: The hair with sere shag arranges slippery nature, bring withy arrange slippery beautiful hair.
sentences.chinese: 使蓬鬆乾枯的頭髮順滑自然，帶來柔韌順滑的秀髮。

sentences.english: A rubber-soled cloth shoe; a sneaker.
sentences.chinese: 有柔韌的橡膠底的一種帆布鞋。

sentences.english: Flexibility, as in the shaft of a golf club.
sentences.chinese: 一片非常薄且有柔韌性的金屬片。

sentences.english: How then to judge your own flexibility?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，怎樣來判斷你自己的柔韌性呢？

sentences.english: Copper covered steel has proper mechanical strength and pliability .
sentences.chinese: 具有適當的機械強度及柔韌性。

sentences.english: Third, he had flexible flesh to work well.
sentences.chinese: 他有柔韌的肌肉來賣力工作。

sentences.english: Children practice splits at the Li Xiaoshuang Gymnastics School in Xiantao, China.
sentences.chinese: 李小雙體操學校的孩子們在進行柔韌性練習。

sentences.english: Stretching regularly will help maintain your flexibility and range of motion.
sentences.chinese: 伸展運動可以經常幫助你保持身體的柔韌性和延展性。

sentences.english: Water prevents the needles from drying and dropping off and maintains the fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 水能使松針保持色澤和柔韌，阻止松針大量脫落。

sentences.english: Hose corrugation designs include Standard Pitch, Open Pitch and Superflex .
sentences.chinese: 波紋軟管的設計包括標準波距，開闊波距和超柔韌。

definition: loose (soil, or limbs of a relaxed person etc)/flaky (pastry etc)
